name: recruitment-platform
description: Real-time Recruitment & Internship Registration Management System

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: Student Development Team
